meanings.definition: The period of time before birth.
meanings.sent1: Many animals care for their prebirths by creating safe nests.
meanings.sent2: The doctor discussed the health of the prebirths during the prenatal check-up.
meanings.sent3: The mama bird sang sweet songs to her prebirths in the cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The prebirths were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of the prebirths filled the air with excitement.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being before birth.
meanings.sent1: The researchers studied the effects of stress on the prebirths of the mice.
meanings.sent2: The mother's love for her prebirths was evident in her gentle movements.
meanings.sent3: The prebirths seemed to dance joyfully in the safety of the womb.
meanings.sent4: The prebirths were like precious secrets waiting to be revealed.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the prebirths' innocence was truly remarkable.
